title: Update site attribution link to webzio.caffeine.app

requirements.text: Change the website link shown in the site footer attribution from https://caffeine.ai to https://webzio.caffeine.app, including updating the anchor text to display "webzio.caffeine.app".

quotes: change the website link to webzio.caffeine.app

acceptanceCriteria: In the footer attribution, the hyperlink href is exactly "https://webzio.caffeine.app".
The visible link text in the footer attribution is exactly "webzio.caffeine.app".
The link still opens in a new tab and retains appropriate security attributes (target="_blank" and rel including "noopener noreferrer").

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the existing Google site verification meta tag unchanged in frontend/index.html.
nonGoals: No changes to navigation routes, page layout, or SEO metadata beyond the requested footer link change.
